page.title: 09BAYSTON HILL NEWSLETTER
page.content: The "Villager"is produced by the Village Association.The Editor is a committee member.The magazine is typed on wax stencils and then run off.The covers are printed by someone else.It costs Â£120 a month for 2200 copies, about 5p a copy.This is paid for by revenue from the adverts.A group of ladies fold and count them out into bundles for each street.A man delivers them to 12 distributors who take them round to the delivery people. Articles are mainly about events in the village and charity announcements about church services and fund raising events.In January the magazine is the Guide to every organisation in the village including councillors,schools and any information that would be helpful. Sometimes people send letters about things that annoy them and sometimes the council put some in too.
